text: Diane R. Noomin ( Rosenblatt, May 13, 1947 â€“ September 1, 2022) was an American comics artist. She was known for her works in the underground comics movement. She is best known for her character DiDi Glitz. Noomin was the editor of the anthology series Twisted Sisters. Her other best known works were in Wimmen's Comix, Young Lust, Arcade, and Weirdo. Noomin died on September 1, 2022 in San Francisco, California at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American comics artists Category:American editors Category:Artists from New York City
title: Diane Noomin
